newsArray.title: Women's T20 World Cup 2024: New Zealand Women Oust Former Champions To Qualify For The Final
creator: ABP News Bureau
newsArray.description: New Zealand Women Beat West Indies Women: New Zealand Women record a sensational 8-run win over West Indies Women in the 2nd semi-final of the ICC Women's T20 World Cup 2024 to storm into the final of the mega event. The White Ferns will now face South Africa Women for the ultimate prize on Sunday, as we are now guaranteed to crown a new champion after England Women; Australia Women; and West Indies Women.New Zealand are into the final with a thrilling win over West Indies üí™#T20WorldCup | #WIvNZ: https://t.co/VE75Yv7wAF pic.twitter.com/b2gznVHu2y‚Äî T20 World Cup (@T20WorldCup) October 18, 2024 This is a breaking news.... more to follow.........

newsArray.title: New T20 World Cup champion confirmed as New Zealand set date with South Africa in Dubai
newsArray.description: The women's T20 World Cup will have a new champion as New Zealand edged past West Indies in the second semifinal of the 2024 edition tournament to set up a finale date with South Africa. The White Ferns survived the Deandra Dottin scare to register a close eight-run win at the Sharjah Cricket Stadium on Friday, October 18.
